objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has downloaded additional executables following the initial infection stage.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: Recorded Future REDDELTA July 2020)(Citation: Sophos PlugX September 2022) [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also leveraged Visual Studio Code `code.exe` and Dev Tunnels using `DevTunnel.exe` to propagate additional tools and payloads.(Citation: Unit42 Chinese VSCode 06 September 2024)
